analysis.description:
KittyRace.race (/unique_chucks/2/0x6b6220677b93e8fc9dc3ffe582e481b7a56c79a9.sol#176-236) sends eth to arbitrary user
	Dangerous calls:
	- PayoutEvent(_raceId,winner.kittyOwner,(entryFee * numRacers) - (processingFee * numRacers),! winner.kittyOwner.send((entryFee * numRacers) - (processingFee * numRacers)),msg.sender,processingFee * numRacers,! msg.sender.send(processingFee * numRacers)) (/unique_chucks/2/0x6b6220677b93e8fc9dc3ffe582e481b7a56c79a9.sol#216-232)

elements.expression: PayoutEvent(_raceId,winner.kittyOwner,(entryFee * numRacers) - (processingFee * numRacers),! winner.kittyOwner.send((entryFee * numRacers) - (processingFee * numRacers)),msg.sender,processingFee * numRacers,! msg.sender.send(processingFee * numRacers))

analysis.description:
KittyRace.getKittySkillScore (/unique_chucks/2/0x6b6220677b93e8fc9dc3ffe582e481b7a56c79a9.sol#237-254) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- genes & geneMasks[i][0] == geneMasks[i][1]
skillScore in KittyRace.getKittySkillScore (/unique_chucks/2/0x6b6220677b93e8fc9dc3ffe582e481b7a56c79a9.sol#243-247) is a local variable never initialiazed

KittyRace.registerForRace.race (local variable @ /unique_chucks/2/0x6b6220677b93e8fc9dc3ffe582e481b7a56c79a9.sol#140) shadows:
	- KittyRace.race (function @ /unique_chucks/2/0x6b6220677b93e8fc9dc3ffe582e481b7a56c79a9.sol#176-236)

Reentrancy in KittyRace.race (/unique_chucks/2/0x6b6220677b93e8fc9dc3ffe582e481b7a56c79a9.sol#176-236):

	State variables written after the call(s):
